publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1733.2 Dennis Canavan: A Sporting Scotland is a Successful Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-1733) in the name of Mr Frank McAveety, insert at end "but recognises that none of the above will be achieved without more resources invested at local level under the auspices of sportscotland and local authorities." Supported by: John Swinburne*, Campbell Martin*, Margo MacDonald*, Dr Jean Turner*
